::Skulletron::

      Skulletron viewed Foxfingers looking through one came=
ra.  Then, he suddenly saw Hot Rod and K-9 outside the CF through the exter=
ior.  Hmmm..Foxfingers could wait, he served no use.  Hot Rod was down.  Ye=
ssss.  Excellent.

     "Feline, I think this is our chance to cause some r=
eal chaos!!!  The Maximal named Hot Rod is down.  We can reprogram him, and=
 tell him that his main goal is to exterminate the one named K-9 and friend=
s.  We might even be able to spread gossip that K-9 killed Hot Rod intentio=
nally!!  Then we'll cause chaos!!!!  So, what do you think, beautiful?"
